actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that no Member of the Congress shall be paid salary for so long as any employee of the Federal Government is not paid because of the failure of the Congress to enact legislation appropriating funds for such purposes.

summary.text: Suspends payment of salaries of Members of the Congress for so long as any employee of the Federal Government is not paid because of the failure of the Congress to enact legislation appropriating funds for such purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no Member of the Congress shall be paid salary for so long as any employee of the Federal Government is not paid because of the failure of the Congress to enact legislation appropriating funds for such purposes.
